value:
I'm not sure why I'm here. This Hero
stuff seems important and all, but it
isn't really "me," you know?

The Officers Academy turned out to
be more work than I expected. Now,
at least, I can just relax...right?

You're on a patrol, huh? But you
practically run the place. Why didn't
you get someone else to do it?

I'm hungry. Why don't you take me
out to dinner in town? The fancier,
the better!

I was writing a letter to my brother.
Force of habit. I have a whole stack
of letters I can't even send him.

Your friend made me come all this
way to say hello. So...hello, I guess.
I hope that was worth it.
I'm going to take a well-earned break.
Maybe hard work does pay off.
I knew it wasn't worth the effort.

Thanks, but...you don't expect me to
actually use this, do you?

Oh, me? I'm Hilda. As long as you
don't saddle me with any hard work,
we should get along just fine.

You probably think that I'm just a
run-of-the-mill slacker, don't you?$k$pWell, you're right. But you're also
wrong. See, I just don't like dealing
with people's expectations.$k$pIf someone overestimates my ability
and I let them down, they're just
going to be disappointed in me.$k$pThat...kinda scares me, to be honest.
So I avoid doing anything that might
end in failure.$k$pBut when it comes to you, I have this
weird, unexplainable urge to help out.$k$pI'm going to make more of an effort
around here. Just don't bury me in
high expectations, OK?
このーっ！
てりゃーっ！
きゃああ！
ぎょえーっ！
You're making me work!
That's enough!
Gotta put in some effort now and then!
Looks like it's up to me!
This is...terrible...
(laugh)
Do you need something?
Hey! What's the big idea?
Just don't expect too much from me, OK?
You're asking a delicate flower like me for help?
Let's chat over a nice cup of tea.
My brother must be worried sick about me...
How about I make you a nice  necklace or something? That shouldn't be too much trouble.
If I must!
Do I have to?
If you insist!
